title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Sunday, with Lorenzo Musetti, Alexander Zverev and Carlos Alcaraz winning their third-round matches. Arthur Fils defeated Stefanos Tsitsipas and Corentin Moutet stunned Holger Rune. View all the Rome tennis results from Sunday below. Rome

Musetti, Zverev, Alcaraz advance on Sunday

May 11, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Sunday, with Lorenzo Musetti, Alexander Zverev and Carlos Alcaraz winning their third-round matches. Arthur Fils defeated Stefanos Tsitsipas and Corentin Moutet stunned Holger Rune.

View all the Rome tennis results from Sunday below.

Results - Sunday, 11 May 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 32
ATP - [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [28] Brandon Nakashima (USA) 64 63
ATP - [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) d [Q] Vilius Gaubas (LTU) 64 60
ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d Laslo Djere (SRB) 76(2) 62
